subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Chapchai Nirat of Thailand shot a six-under 65 on Sunday in the completion of the third round of the Singapore Open to take a three-stroke lead. Lam Chih Bing, seeking to become the first Singaporean to win the $5 million tournament, was second. Phil Mickelson finished up his third round with a 66, putting him at six under.
